overview: Comedy - Think Road Trip recombined with American Pie (and perhaps a dash of Porky's thrown in for good measure), and you've got the improbable plot of Tangy Guacamole. A group of raucous, raunchy teenagers on spring break in Mexico find plenty of adventures that are sure to stoke their overactive libidos. You can bet it's tangy. â€¦ -  David Borowicz, DJ Perry, Dennis Haskins
title: Tangy Guacamole
